name: Envcares
description: Envcares is a Singapore home grown SME, founded in 2014 by a small group of well experienced individuals coming together to collaborate and combine each others strengths. Envcares facility includes a large area for the disposal and sorting of various type of recyclables, eg. food waste, general waste, alcoholic beverages/liquid, e-waste as well as horticulture waste thereby contributing to the circular economy. Through the recycling process, we also supply organic compost and animal feeds.
